meaningMnemonic: In the <radical>mysterious</radical> <radical>rice paddy</radical> there is some <kanji>livestock</kanji>. This livestock is also mysterious because no one knows where it came from. The mysterious livestock are only seen in the mysterious rice paddy. How mysterious indeed.
readingMnemonic: Your favorite member of the mysterious <kanji>livestock</kanji> crew is a little <reading>chick</reading> (ちく). The chick is very cute and little. The chick is also very mysterious because it floats about without even flapping its little wings.
